title: Picasso: a painter's diary
creator_credit: WNET (Television station : New York, N.Y.), Thirteen and Perry Miller Adato
brief_description: Presents an overview of the life of Pablo Picasso, the main theme being that Picasso’s painting were his autobiography. Features photographs, documentary footage and interviews with friends and family of Picasso. Many of Picasso’s works are highlighted. Contains some B&W scenes. Suitable for upper secondary level.
